Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.6 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 9.4 with a standard deviation 2. The z-score of the person with 10.6 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.74
* 0.6
* 1.71

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.74: Incorrect
* 0.6: Correct
* 1.71: Incorrect
